div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1723 Egypt, 1908 (371) Burial: 30 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 400 AR Ptolemy XII Auletes: 3 tetradr. (as Svo- ronos 1837, 1839) Cleopatra VII: 94 tetradr. (as Sv. 1819, 1822-32, 1834-5) Disposition: New York some Note by E. T. Newell in ANS (97 listed in detail)
